message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see there is a section labeled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" with three line items:
- Beginning Balance
- Ending Balance
- Net Increase

The Beginning Balance represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period. According to the statement, this value is 20000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '20000000.00'} }
```
